name: devtools-demo
description: A monorepo showcasing the benefits of Chrome Developer Tools with Fastify backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/api && npm run build --workspace=apps/backend && npm run build --workspace=apps/frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=apps/backend && npm run lint --workspace=apps/frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=packages/api && npm run type-check --workspace=apps/backend && npm run type-check --workspace=apps/frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=apps/backend && npm run test --workspace=apps/frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/*/.next

author: Luca Del Puppo
